column5: Just want to let people know that if you are ever in the Brockville area and want to fish.  I would be more than happy to take you out.  Usually after work and Sundays.  I have enough gear that if you are on a road trip I can supply that for you as well.
Extremely generous offer that I hope to take you up on if/when I get out that way.
That's an offer worth making the trip for....
wish I had a reason to take a drive your way .. wait fishing is a great reason!  Great offer Scott , same here if you are very in the Barrie area !  dave
Thank you Scott. That is a very generous offer and it would be an honor..  Will
